extendedInfo.description: Quick App Clean Cache becomes Quick App Manager, a complete and powerful application manager : - Cache cleaner - History cleaner - Task killer - App 2 SD manager (for Android 2.2 or higher) - Mobile traffic - Plus! A security tool helper that displays non system applications using potentially risky permissions.ââ NOTE ââWhen after update to 3.5 "Clear all" function does not work anymore, go to Menu/Settings and check "Force cleaning"â Cache cleaner â - Clear all caches at once WITHOUT BEEING ROOT - Clear cache for a specified application - Auto clear all caches at a specified interval - Notification for a specific total cache size - List applications by either cache, data, source, total size, name, running, running app or system - Show application details page - Ignore list for the clear all process (root only) - Favorites to keep in top of list - Widget one tap clear allâ Task killer â- System or application- Kill all selected at once- Soft kill or system force close- Ignore list for the kill all processâ History cleaner  âClear following histories: - Call logs - Read SMS/MMS - Browser history - Market search - Gmail search - Quick search bar history - Maps search - Navigation history - Youtube search - Clipboard data - Frequent calls :   Only for suppliers using based Android "Contacts" application (HTC excluded for example) - And all apps using android search history API - Display histories entries when available  - Ignore list for the clear all process - Favorites to keep in top of listâ App to SD manager (Android 2.2 or higher) âApp2SD facility tool: - List movable apps - Move one or all apps to SD card (manual assist) - Move app back to the internal storageâ Security help âDisplays all non system applications using potentially risky permissionsâ Mobile traffic âOnce activated, allows to monitor mobile traffic for each application, daily, weekly or monthlyâ Widget notes âSometimes have to reboot phone before seeing widget in list at firt install or update.Avoid to install the application on the SD card if you want to use it.â Force close after update âMay rarely happen, just uninstall and reinstallâ Remark / Issue âPlease send mail, comments rarely watchedAndroid 1.5 to at least 2.3r1, optimized for 2.2 or higherSupport/updates only for Android 2.0 or higher

reviews.title: The best
reviews.comment: I use this on all my Androids and never have an issue. I would like to see an update that supports the new Google Maps and there are a few other apps it does not detect the caches on such as theChive.
reviews.author: Keith Rea

reviews.title: Needs an Update
reviews.comment: It\'s like Windows CCleaner for Android but I wish that the publisher would give an option to disable auto rotate. It is independent of the device state and always on. Please provide a toggle. Also the app needs to be updated to the new Android design guidelines.
reviews.author: A Google User

reviews.title: Aireanna
reviews.comment: When it runs it is one of the best spps out there but it runs for a while and then will not connect to the internet to varify my purchase. Have to keep uninstalling and re install. I run Froyo.  Tired of it.
reviews.author: A Google User

reviews.title: Garbage
reviews.comment: This app used to be good but now it won\'t stay open and keeps on asking me if I want to reload the datas. Whether you choose yes or no, it still asks you EVERY TIME. Uninstalling.
reviews.author: A Google User

reviews.title: HTC One
reviews.comment: Doesn\'t work on HTC One ...please fix it.
reviews.author: A Google User

reviews.title: Please fix asap.
reviews.comment: Slow to load up now and today\'s even when rotation is off. These issues started with latest update.
reviews.author: A Google User

reviews.title: Was a good app until...
reviews.comment: Was working well until the last update... please fix asap!
reviews.author: A Google User

reviews.title: Excellent
reviews.comment: Worthwhile! - does exactly what it claims!
reviews.author: Jeanette Turner

reviews.comment: Needs landscape UI for Samsung Galaxy Tab 10.1 with Andr. 3.2. It doesn\'t get upgrade.
reviews.author: A Google User

reviews.title: BS
reviews.comment: First attempts to use it and it suddenly stops working..too late to get a refund..bs
reviews.author: jan schulze

reviews.title: Pretty good.
reviews.comment: Not bad.
reviews.author: A Google User

reviews.title: Loving it! STILL
reviews.comment: The easiest way to clean up cache and history. I would like for it to not to run in the background if you don\'t use the widget. Which is not really a necessary feature. Also please add the ability to delete most contacted contacts list in the favorites tab
reviews.author: A Google User

reviews.title: Was good
reviews.comment: Rooted Samsung galaxy note 2...when setting to widget use to clean all cache...not anymore keeps like 4 or 5 with cache for some reason now. There not even system apps..just games etc... please fix to clear all cache..dont work on JB
reviews.author: A Google User

reviews.title: Great app for up to Jelly Bean
reviews.comment: For less than $1USD I got what I needed to clear cache &on programs I didn\'t know had it! Now they added lots more to this app!!
reviews.author: A Google User

reviews.title: Samsung Galaxy S ii 4.x
reviews.comment: Work perfect on my device. For first time clean 17 MB 5*
reviews.author: A Google User

reviews.title: Doesn\'t work on JB
reviews.comment: Crashes to desktop on my galaxy s3
reviews.author: A Google User

reviews.title: ICS Melted This App Cleaner!
reviews.comment: Bought App... can\'t use anymore :~{  ICS is huge problem!  Hope Dev will rewrite app...
reviews.author: A Google User

reviews.title: Indispensable
reviews.comment: Works as advertised, does the job, quick and clean. An option to turn off the exit confirmation would be nice. :)
reviews.author: A Google User

reviews.title: Worth every penny
reviews.comment: Solve so many issues especially stalled or crashed apps... Great app manager!
reviews.author: A Google User

reviews.title: Bryan
reviews.comment: On non rooted mobiles works well after a system update ,thanks .
reviews.author: A Google User
